attributes.action: Recently Fijian volunteers in the British Army. Were denied Uk Citizenship
attributes.additional_details: It is to honour the Covenent, between the armed forces, the crown and the Government
attributes.background: If an oversea's person volunteers to wear a British uniform with a Union Flag on their shoulder and a British crown on their beret. Willing to stand shoulder to shoulder, ready to lay down their lives. Must be offered the chance to settle as a British Citizen, on their honourable discharge

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/321411
